title: #407: Obsessive Obsessive Compulsive Compulsive Obsessive Compulsive Compulsive Obsessive Compulsive Compulsive Compulsive Obsessive Obsessive Obsessive Compulsive Obsessive Obsessive Compulsive Compulsive Compulsive Obsessive Obsessive (with @EliSairs)
itunes:title: Obsessive Compulsive with Eli Sairs
description:
Eli Sairs came over to talk to me about his OCD. He's got it bad. And it's all wrapped up with Jesus, too, which makes it even harder to deal with. The levels this guy has to go through just to make through basic life stuff is astounding. I bet he eats box really thoroughly, though. Didn't ask him about that. I wish I had.

Follow Eli Sairs @EliSairs on Instagram

Click here for Eli's podcast, The Roast Ghost.

Follow me @AriShaffir on Instagram

Sign up for my patreon. Patreon.com/AriShaffir

 

The Music

Alt J - Interlude

Bill Withers - Lovely Day

Brand New Heavies - Dream On Dreamers

Kid Cudi - Trapped In My Mind

Daniel Johnston - Devil Town
